txt.en: Ingold can be found at the North-gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Ingold.
'Good work. You have prevented the Orcs from destroying the orchard. Their cunning ways continue to both impress and disgust me. We must keep these vile creatures at bay.'
Morgul Defilers can be found in Eryn Lothad.\n\nYou should defeat defilers to protect the orchard from being ravaged.

'There is much awry in Pelennor. The enemy is slowly approaching towards Minas Tirith. Just recently I saw a small patrol of Orcs heading towards Eryn Lothad just south-west of here. Can I count on you to investigate and defeat these Orcs?\n\n'I fear the safety of the orchard as we will need them to feed the soldiers after this battle is won.'
Ingold, captain of the Out-wall, refuses to leave his post. In his vigilance he has seen enemy troops head towards the nearby orchard.
